text:
The festival of festivals held on the
surface of the moon, the Galaxy Carnival Expo.
An attack occurred in the midst of it.

Thanks to [Player] and the heroes' efforts,
the incident was resolved,
and several days have passed since then.

The event has regained its composure,
and is about to reach its grand
finale with great success.

Walking through the stalls of the bustling Japan Pavilion,
which has succeeded in attracting customers,
[Player] mutters to themselves.

options.text: I can't believe it's gotten this lively...
It has gotten so different from the first day.
I'm glad we've all worked hard.

text:
While enjoying the laughter from the people around
and the aroma wafting from the food stalls,
[Player] hears a voice calling out to them.

name: Barrel
text:
Ah, I knew it!
It's you, [Player]-san!
Good evening~!!

In the direction [Player] turned their gaze to,
from the festival stalls lined up, a smiling
Barrel was waving his hand along with his tail.

name: Barrel
text:
[Player]-san,
are you alone right now~?
What a coincidence, so am I~!

name: Barrel
text:
Today's the last day, so I was thinking of
going around the stalls one last time~.
If you'd like, why don't you join me~?

options.text: Sounds good, let's go!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wooo, alright~!!
We'll get to all of them, so leave the guiding to me~!!

options.text: I was just wandering around too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wooo, alright~!!
We'll get to all of them, so leave the guiding to me~!!

options.text: Please be my guide, Mr. Festival Man!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text: Whoa! If you're going to call me by that nickname, I can't do anything that would dishonor it~!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
The magical festival tour is starting~!
Now, now, leave it all to me, and follow my lead~!

text:
With a huge smile on his face,
Barrel takes [Player]'s hand and walks them
through the lively festival stalls.

Watching over the scene,
Barrel's tail was wagging violently, as if
it was overflowing from his smile.

name: Barrel
text:
It's super exciting, right~!?
When I first got here,
it felt a little lonely, but—

name: Barrel
text:
It's very lively, and all the guests
are having a great time.
We really did a good job~!

options.text: It's because everyone worked hard!
It's all thanks to your love for festivals, Barrel.
Let's brag about it when we get back!

name: Barrel
text:
Yes~!
...Well then, we should also
start going around the stalls!

name: Barrel
text:
Seeing all this excitement
makes my tension go wild~!
It's seriously amazing~!

Humming a tune as he walks,
Barrel weaves through the crowd
and checks out the stalls one after another.

name: Barrel
text:
Hmm hmm hmm~
Takoyaki, yakisoba,
frankfurters and shaved ice~.

name: Barrel
text:
Man, it's hard to decide where to start~!
Maybe I should start with the basics... Ah.

Barrel stops in his tracks,
and in the direction of his gaze,
there was a cotton candy stall.

Seeing that, Barrel smiles quietly,
and makes his way towards the stall.

And, in both of Barrel's hands
as he returns to [Player],
there was a cotton candy in each.

name: Barrel
text:
[Player]-san, here you go~!
It might not fill you up,
but you can have it if you'd like~!

options.text: You sure I can have it?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course~!
Now, now, don't hold back, go ahead and eat it~!

options.text: Thank you, I'm happy.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're welcome~!
Now, now, don't hold back, go ahead and eat it~!

options.text: It's not super spicy?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text: No, no! Even I wouldn't recommend something at my preferred level of spiciness to someone else~!

text:
Taking the cotton candy handed to them with a smile,
the two of them walk side by side
through the lively festival stalls.

name: Barrel
text:
...Hehe.
Actually, I've always dreamed of this.
Like this—

name: Barrel
text:
Not with my colleagues or friends... Um.
Just the two of us, at a festival,
walking around.

While blushing and looking away,
Barrel mutters quietly.
In the direction of his gaze—

name: Child's Voice
text:
Uuu...
*sniffle*...

A small child was crying,
presumably having fallen,
and at his feet a cotton candy rolling in dirt.

name: Barrel
text:
Ah...
...Oh dear.
Did that kid fall~?

For a moment, his eyes narrow nostalgically,
and Barrel gently grips the cotton
candy in his hand again. And then—

name: Barrel
text:
[Player]-san.
I have a favor to ask of you...
Can you transform me into that form~?

options.text: Of course, here goes, Barrel!
If you could, Mr. Festival Man!
I'm counting on you, Symphonic Trigger!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Hehe, thanks~!
Well then, I'll
be right back~!

At his words, Barrel leaves
[Player]'s side with a huge smile,
and runs off with a light step.

And to the child who is still crying,
he runs up to them and gently holds
out the cotton candy gripped in his hand.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
It's okay, don't cry~.
Here you go, your cotton candy
came back all big~!

name: Child's Voice
text:
Eh, ehh!?
It's Symphonic Trigger!
Um, can I, really have this..?

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Of course! When something sad happens,
a super-sized happy thing comes after it~!
Now, now, smile, smile~!

name: Child's Voice
text:
Okay!
Thank you, Symphonic Trigger!!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
'You're welcome'~!
Be careful not to fall
next time~!!

that phrase is actually in English
absolute cinema

The child takes the cotton candy
from Barrel and smiles, and Barrel
gently sees him off.

options.text: Good work!
I'm glad he was happy!
You were so cool back there!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel (Stella Link)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Was I really that cool~!?
Hehe... [Player]-san, when you say that, it makes me feel kind of ticklish~.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
...Actually. When I was a kid, the exact same
thing happened to me. What I just said was
something I learned from a very important person~.

Barrel returns [Player]'s smile and
continues to speak in bits and pieces.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Back then, I thought that everything
adults said was right, and that
I had to follow them properly~.

Remembering his past self,
Barrel's expression momentarily darkens.
And then, it quickly changes back to a smile.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
But, my grandma...
Thanks to that important person's words,
I came to love myself~!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Well, I might be a little too honest with myself,
and the detective and my boss had to tell me
to exercise self-control, but...

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
But, but I have always been, and always will be!
The coolest police officer and hero!
There's no way I'm ever going to give that up~!

options.text: She sounds like a wonderful person.
She must be a very important person to you, Barrel.
I'd like to meet her someday.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
That's because she's my best family~!!
Well, she lives in a village on a mountain in Shinshu,
so I don't get to visit her very often~.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Ah... [Player]-san, if you are interested,
next time I go see her, maybe we can
go together to give her a greeting...

As Barrel blushes and speaks to [Player],
an announcement echoes through the venue.

name: Venue Announcement
text:
To all visitors of the GCE, this event will
soon reach its grand finale.
Except for the stage where the ceremony will be held—

name: Venue Announcement
text:
All pavilions will be closed.
There is only a little time left, but please
do enjoy yourselves until the very end.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Ehh!!?
The stalls are closing even
before we get to eat~!!?

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
[Player]-san!
Please wait for me a little bit~,
I'll go get something good~!!

At the closing announcement,
Barrel hurriedly guides [Player] to
a nearby table and runs off.

options.text: He's gone in an instant...
I'm excited to see Barrel's choice.
I could have helped him...

text:
A few minutes passed after Barrel disappears in the
opposite direction of the crowd heading to the stage.

Just as [Player] stands up,
thinking they can do something,
Barrel's voice reaches their ears.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
[Player]-sa—n!
Sorry for making you wait~,
here's my special delivery~!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Hehe, with this, [Player]-san,
you and I can enjoy the
festival to our fullest~!

Barrel returns with a pile of festival food in his hands.
As if to lament the end of the event,
a red light gently illuminates his figure.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Now, now, please sit down~!
The festival's almost over,
so we gotta enjoy it until the very end~!!

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
I'd really recommend this one~!
[Player]-san, you go first,
so here, say 'ah'~!

At Barrel's offer, [Player]
takes a bite and returns a smile.
At that smile, Barrel smiles back.

As they reminisce about the past few days,
the two of them spend the last
moments of the festival together.

By the time they finish their meal and take a break,
the sky above has finished its projection,
and the starry sky as it is has spread out.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
So, the festival is over~.
Somehow, it feels like it
went by in a flash...

options.text: A lot happened, but it was fun.
It's a little sad...
I wish I could have been with everyone more.

text:
The crowd moving to the stage has disappeared,
leaving Japan Pavilion in silence, as if the
previous hustle and bustle was a lie.

Illuminated by the light of the Earth above,
Barrel gently gazes at [Player].

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
[Player]-san.
At this festival, I've had
a lot of different feelings~.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
I wanted everyone to enjoy the festival,
and I wanted to share the festival with everyone.
And then—

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Pain, sadness...
Not being able to tell others of it,
those kinds of feelings too~.

Quietly and slowly choosing his words,
Barrel conveys his words so [Player].

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Maybe, that's why I... No.
'I' have thought to myself, that I want
to face my own feelings too~.

At the same time as his words,
the fireworks on the stage sparkled,
illuminating the deserted festival stalls.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
The event is
already over, but...

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
For 'me', the festival
isn't over yet~.
...So.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
...Won't you stay with
me until the end~?

Under the colorfully sparkling fireworks,
Barrel gently embraces [Player] in his arms.

The body heat transmitted from their
touching bodies, and Barrel's passionate,
earnest whispers in their ear.

The light shining from above disappears,
and silence returns to Japan Pavilion.
The two of them were no longer there.
